title: Quaternion group
summary: In group theory,  the quaternion group Q8 (sometimes just denoted by Q) is a non-abelian group of order eight, isomorphic to the eight-element subset { 1 , i , j , k , − 1 , − i , − j , − k } {\displaystyle \{1,i,j,k,-1,-i,-j,-k\}} of the quaternions under multiplication. It is given by the group presentation
